Participatory Democracy 💻🗳️

Jun 23, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • public policy
  • civic engagement
  • government
  • COVID-19
  • democracy

Wietse Van Ransbeeck, CEO of Citizen Lab drops by the podcast for a conversation about democracy and civic participation. We’ll also cover a bit about the role technology may play in both.
